quiz.title: Building Plan Knowledge Quiz
quiz.description: Test your knowledge of building plans, construction specifications, and compliance requirements.

questions.question: What is the minimum thickness specified for the reinforced concrete slab foundation in the main building?
questions.explanation: The main building utilizes a reinforced concrete slab foundation with a minimum thickness of 150mm, as specified in the Foundation Design Document.

questions.question: Which electrical safety regulation does the building's electrical system comply with?

options.text: 16th Edition of the IEE Wiring Regulations
17th Edition of the IEE Wiring Regulations
18th Edition of the IEE Wiring Regulations (BS 7671:2018+A1:2020)
19th Edition of the IEE Wiring Regulations

questions.explanation: The electrical system complies with the 18th Edition of the IEE Wiring Regulations (BS 7671:2018+A1:2020), which includes RCD protection for all circuits.

questions.question: What type of insulation is specified for the exterior walls of the building?
questions.explanation: Exterior walls feature a multi-layer insulation system consisting of 100mm rigid polyisocyanurate (PIR) boards with a thermal conductivity of 0.022 W/mK.

questions.question: What is the fire resistance rating of the compartmentation walls between different usage areas?
questions.explanation: The building incorporates fire-resistant compartmentation with 60-minute fire-rated walls and floors between different usage areas, in compliance with Building Regulations Part B.

questions.question: What is the minimum door width required for accessibility compliance in the building?
questions.explanation: The building design complies with Accessibility Regulations and Building Regulations Part M, with door widths having a minimum 900mm clear opening with accessible thresholds not exceeding 15mm height.
